name: Arrow.12.3.2020
description:
Scond update of arrow! (An angry-birds ripoff inspired game made for practice and fun)

Just a small update

Controls:

> Simply drag the arrow and aim towards the enemies.

> Press 'R' to quickly restart the current level

> *Temporary* Press 'A' or 'D' to traverse levels (There are only 6 levels at the moment because im lazy).

> Press 1 to summon something interesting.

Changes:
  • Added a  splash screen intro
  • Added blackholes
  • Reworked some levels
  • Added wooden platforms (incomplete)
  • Added Explosive Chickens (incomplete)
  • Fixed a few bugs
  • Improved physic properties of all objects, now collisions look cooler.
  • All objects can now damage each other, damage scales depending on velocity (still thinking about including mass).
Known bugs:

- You can still touch the arrow after it was launched

- blackholes don't attract each other.

- some death effects are jittery and ugly

- blackholes can sometimes repel objects instead of attracting.

- chickens don't have a death explosion effect yet.

- idfk some more bugs ig.
